response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am confident that this product could be invaluable to you, potentially enhancing your business or personal endeavors significantly. Given its high value and the benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer aims to provide a fair balance between compensating for the product's true worth and ensuring a reasonable return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further and exploring how we might collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 950000}
